taskbody.prereq: To restrict any of your private information, log into your MyPack Portal
taskbody.context: Under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA), you have the right to restrict all or part of your directory information, which includes your preferred email, your enrollment status (full-time/part-time), major field of study, and more.

step.info: Look to the left hand navigation menu to find 'Privacy Restrictions'

step.cmd: Select 'Restrict' under the directory field you would like to restrict access to
Select 'Clear' if you wish to release the restriction for that field
If you choose a Full Privacy Block, you can grant exceptions for certain publications by:
step.info: Select a 'Full Privacy Block' to prevent us from sharing your information with anyone, including employers. A full privacy block also prevents your inclusion in graduation and Dean's List publications.

substep.cmd: Select the 'Exceptions' you would like to grant

step.cmd: Select the green 'Save' button to save your changes
